analysis.description: BahrainToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#313-319) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol:
	Contract BahrainToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BahrainToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#289-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#292)

BahrainToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#313-319)
	- /unique_chucks/34/0xf7f79248bf395d8977ac792beea937008fe58b81.sol#318-319
